column4: Is it possible to launch an application to a specific workspace?
don't know if compiz can do that, at least devilspie can I think, google that one
yes, devilspie can, read http://ubuntu-tutorials.com/2007/07/25/how-to-set-default-workspace-size-and-window-effects-in-gnome/, there is an example on firefox to open on workspace 2
do you use compiz? isn't there an option to name your workspaces in compiz? Don't know if that would help
I use what is essentially a vanilla install.
